page.title: 08TRADE IN WELWYN GARDEN CITY
page.content: Trade in Welwyn Garden City is very good. In the town centre there is a great variety of shops. Some are small businesses but there is also a large department store belonging to John Lewis. It is a large shop containing a sports department, a toy department, a clothes department for children and separate departments for men and women's clothes, as well as a branch of Miss Selfridge. Other shops which sell clothes include Dorothy Perkins, Burtons, Fosters Menswear and Stadium Sports. Lots of people shop in Welwyn Garden City and so they need money. In our area there are branches of three banks, Barclays, National Westminster and Lloyds, and two Building Societies, Nationwide and the Woolwich.
